Keywords: Avengers , Cosmic , Future , Past
Real Name: Rick Jones
Special Powers
SUMMONING MY FAVORITE HEROES!: At the beginning of the game, generate a bystander on his card. Each bystander on this card can only be generated once per turn.
THAT BLAST CAME FROM MY MIND!: Incapacitate. When Rick Jones uses it, he may also deal his printed damage value to hit characters given an action token.
